creator: Maritim
descriptionHtml:
MAP Maritim - The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

MAP Maritim is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. It consists of timelines, news feeds and chat features similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk.

The benefits of MAP Maritim:

- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Security & Management

MAP Maritim is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should anything go wrong, there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

Feature list:

- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- Messages
- News
- Events
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications
descriptionShort: The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

descriptionShort: The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvements:
- Fix issue where app does not display all images that are attached to a post/news inside the details screen.

Improvements in the Task Management premium feature:
- Task create/edit/delete actions are now behind permissions.
- Task list screen now shows all tasks in a single list.
- Add new "Assigned by me" filter.
- Improve spacing of task list items.
- Improve UX of date & time picker in creating a task.

Most new features are announced in the app itself. Check them in About!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvements:
- Video thumbnails for news and pages are now set to 16:9 ratio.
- Fix: App crashes when clicking voice search in search screens.
- Fix: Group admin cannot pin/unpin posts inside group timeline.
- Fix: Issue with playing videos for news items which contains multiple videos.

Improvements in the Task Management premium feature:
- Newly created tasks now appears in the list automatically (without refreshing).

Most new features are announced in the app itself. Check them in About!

- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Security & Management

MAP Maritim is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should anything go wrong, there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

Feature list:

- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- Messages
- News
- Events
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications
descriptionShort: The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners
title: MAP Maritim

creator: Maritim
descriptionHtml:
MAP Maritim - The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

MAP Maritim is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. It consists of timelines, news feeds and chat features similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk.

The benefits of MAP Maritim:

- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should anything go wrong, there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvements:
- You can now create events from the app!

Improvements in Task Management premium feature:
- "My Tasks" tab now shows assignee instead of author avatar.
- Some UI improvements in task list screens.

Most new features are announced in the app itself. Check them in About!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvements:
- Confirm primary email after log in
- Hide translate option when content is empty
- Fix: user gets logged out in some cases
- Fix: the name of a third-party app is not displayed in some cases
- Fix: crashes on Android 6 or below

Improvements in Task Management premium feature:
- Add search functionality to task assignees list
- Fix: comments not loading when opening a task from a notification

Most new features are announced in the app itself. Check them in About!
